channel.title: No google juice on NBest – Politepix

item.title: No google juice on NBest
item.dc:creator: davestrand
item.description:
Hi.

Could you briefly explain what N-Best is and how it is typically used? -> pocketsphinxDidReceiveNBestHypothesisArray

Does it look for multiple string combinations?

item.title: Reply To: No google juice on NBest
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
Hi Dave,

It just returns the top hypotheses, for however many hypotheses it found for the utterance while searching. So if it found 3 valid hypotheses, it is returning the 3 best results, which is why it’s called n-best (n because the number it is going to find isn’t known in advance).

item.title: Reply To: No google juice on NBest
item.dc:creator: davestrand
